thread.title: 16 rose-scented perfumes that will keep you feeling as fresh as a flower
thread.title_full: 16 rose-scented perfumes that will keep you feeling as fresh as a flower

author: Zara H
title: 16 rose-scented perfumes that will keep you feeling as fresh as a flower
text:
16 rose-scented perfumes that will keep you feeling as fresh as a flower There’s nothing more romantic than a deliciously floral perfume , and roses are obviously the perfect note to seek out when you’re looking for a Valentine’s Day scent. Whether you’re looking to treat yourself to a new perfume that you can wear on the holiday , need to hint to your partner that they should pick up a new scent for you, or are looking for a great Valentine’s Day gift for someone you love, we think these gorgeous rose fragrances are the perfect jumping off point.
These scents are a mix of high-end and affordable — some are light and feminine, others are sensual and deep. The one thing they all have in common? Prominent rose notes, which make them perfect for the holiday of love.
Here are 16 fragrances that will make you feel like a human bouquet!
Bvlgari Rose Goldea Eau de Parfum , $112 Bloomingdale's Everything from the feminine scent to the pretty packaging just screams “luxe.”
Gourmand Macaron Rose , $18 Urban Outfitters 
If you like your perfumes on the sweet, affordable side, this will be your jam.
Jo Malone Red Roses , $130 Jo Malone 
A gorgeously sophisticated scent that doesn’t smell artificial in the least.
Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming , $94 Dior 
The beautiful bottle on this one makes it a perfect gift.
Viva La Juicy Rosé Eau de Parfum , $76 Ulta 
The glitter addict in your life will love this packaging, and the scent is wonderful too!
Vera Wang Embrace Spray Rose Buds and Vanilla , $29.99 Walgreens 
We love how the creamy hint of vanilla softens this scent.
Adorn Rose Quartz , $24 Urban Outfitters 
A light, natural and not at all cloying fragrance.
Yardley English Rose , $18.39 
The Perfume Spot 
If a classic rose scent is what you’re after, this one should do the trick.
Pacifica Persian Rose Solid Perfume , $9 Pacifica 
We love the portability of this pretty solid scent!
Chloé Roses de Chloé Eau de Toilette , $70 Ulta 
This one is light, girly and a total classic.
Nourish Organic Rejuvenating Rose Hip & Rosewater Body Oil Mist , $12.95 Thrive Market 
If straight-up perfume isn’t your thing, you’ll appreciate this scented oil.
Elizabeth and James Nirvana Rose, $85 Sephora We love how the rose notes sweeten this dark scent.
Aerin Evening Rose , $115 Sephora Literally the perfect date night perfume.
Balenciaga Florabotanica Eau de Parfum , $134 Macy's 
Mint notes add an herb-y quality to this rose scent.
Bond No. 9 Harrods Rose , $170 Bond No. 9 This scent is all kinds of posh, and can we talk about that show-stopping bottle?
Diptyque Eau Eau Rose Eau de Toilette , $98 Diptyque 
Diptyque’s scent are always impeccably formulated, and this limited-edition rose spray is no exception.
We hope you find one of these rose-themed options to be your next signature scent!
